Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
March 18, 2020
We reached an agreement yesterday on a new legislative package that will provide strong support for American families and communities in dealing with the coronavirus.
						President Donald J. Trump					STRONG LEGISLATIVE ACTION: President Donald J. Trump is signing a legislative package that provides extensive assistance to Americans impacted by the coronavirus.
